id.description: The unique identifier of the program.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the program was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the program was last updated.

name.description: The name or title of the program.

description.description: The detailed information or overview of the program.

url.description: The URL associated with the program.

type.description: The type or category of the program.

channel.description: The marketing channel associated with the program.

status.description: The current status of the program.

workspace.description: The workspace or environment where the program is located.

headStart.description: The time duration for the program to start.

isHeadStart.description: Indicates if the program has a head start feature enabled.

folder.description: Details about the folder associated with the program

type.description: The type or category of the folder.

value.description: The unique value associated with the folder.

folderName.description: The name of the folder where the program is stored.
